svcsubproc.title: Rear View Mirror- Driver Side
svcsubproc.para: The driver side rear view mirror is a body mounted mirror forward of the drivers window. The mirror is mounted on a bracket below the drivers window plane.

step1.para: To remove the drivers exterior rear view mirror, locate the four mounting bolts attaching the bracket to the bus body.

figure.caption: Figure 99. Driver Side Rear View Mirror

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. DRIVER SIDE REAR VIEW MIRROR HEAD ASSEMBLY
2. DRIVER SIDE REAR VIEW MIRROR MOUNTING SCREWS

step1.para: If mirror head is equipped with mirror heaters, disconnect the harness connection.
Access the harness connection plugs in the electrical compartment below the drivers window assembly. Remove the body grommet prior to pulling mirror harness through body opening.
